name: The Holy Family
description: The Holy Family; Baldassare Peruzzi (Italian, 1481 - 1536); Italy; about 1515; Pen and brown ink, black chalk; top left squared in black chalk for transfer; 23.8 x 19.1 cm (9 3/8 x 7 1/2 in.); 87.GG.20; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Holy Family
medium: Pen and brown ink, black chalk; top left squared in black chalk for transfer
